summary: The Facilitating Useful Loss Limitations to Help Our Unique Service Economy (FULL HOUSE) Act, introduced in the Senate in July 2025, aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. Specifically, it seeks to reinstate the pre-existing rules regarding wagering losses, allowing such losses to be deducted only up to the extent of wagering gains. This includes deductions incurred in carrying out wagering transactions. The changes are intended to take effect for taxable years starting after December 31, 2025.
